text: Robert of Châtillon (died 1210), duke and bishop of Langres from 1205 until his death. He is also notable as a peer of France and a cousin of Bernard of Clairvaux. == References == Category:Bishops of Langres Category:12th-century births Category:1210 deaths Category:Year of birth unknown Category:13th- century peers of France
title: Robert of Châtillon
